step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Keep your arms straight and fingers open as you begin to stretch overhead.
Nice job stretching your arms overhead. Remember to keep your fingers spread wide.
You're making a good fist and squeezing your shoulder blades. Try to inhale a bit more deeply as you tighten.
Great extension back overhead! Focus on a full exhale as you relax your muscles.
Excellent return to the starting position. Ensure your arms are fully stretched overhead.
Second rep starting well. Maintain that overhead stretch with open fingers.
Good overhead stretch again. Keep those fingers wide and active.
You're effectively making a fist and squeezing your shoulder blades. Breathe in fully as you engage your muscles.
Excellent movement back overhead. Remember to exhale completely as you relax.
Well done completing the second rep! Ensure your arms are fully extended overhead at the start.

exercise_summary: Great job with the Push Down Pumping exercise! You consistently followed the instructions to stretch your arms overhead, make a fist, and squeeze your shoulder blades. Remember to focus on deep inhales when tightening and full exhales when relaxing for maximum benefit.
